notes.text: sap.ui.core.AccInfo: Option for controls to provide information about their accessibility state"

m.MenuButton: Implementation
m.ViewSettingsDialog: Filter details page now implements search-while-you-type
new sap.m.FormattedText control
sap.m.CheckBox valueState support implemented
sap.m.CheckBox, Link, ProgressIndicator, RatingIndicator: Provide function getAccessibilityInfo

sap.m.ComboBoxBase: add "loadItem" event
sap.m.DatePicker, TimePicker, DateTimePicker, DateTimeInput: Provide function getAccessibilityInfo

sap.m.DateTimePicker: new control
sap.m.Dialog: ACC improvements
sap.m.Dialog: Added ariaLabelledBy association
sap.m.FlexBox, sap.ui.layout.Grid,
sap.m.GenericTile: Header mode added
sap.m.GenericTile: Property size deprecated

sap.m.Image, sap.ui.core.Icon: Provide function getAccessibilityInfo

sap.m.SegmentedButton: allow invisible button segments

sap.m.SplitApp: Visual test is added

sap.m.TextArea: "growing" and "growingMaxLines" properties are added.
sap.m.Title: Avoid complete rendering when text property is changed
sap.m.ToggleButton: Provide function getAccessibilityInfo
sap.m.UploadCollection: Download methods on API level provided
sap.m.UploadCollection: Provide the possibility to include attributes as links
sap.m.UploadCollection: Upload New Version method on API level provided
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog now fires "filterDetailPageOpened" event when the filter detail page is opened.
sap.ui.core.AccInfo: Option for controls to provide information about their accessibility state
sap.ui.core.Control: Introduce function getAccessibilityInfo
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add width property

Fieldgroup check is not done for sub-controls

ManagedObject: Propagate properties when setting parent to null

Scrolled content in the Popover was visible in IE

TextArea placement in Fiori Client Windows Phone
Update library description for sap.m
Update the sap.m library description and make it consistent
Walkthrough: remove unneeded height, fake ACH, correct hAlign

cursor position in sap.m.SearchField after re-rendering
invalidation of the NavContainer was causing the popover to close
m.Dialog,commons.Dialog,ux3.ToolPopup: Preserve Content on Remove
m.IconTabBar: windows 10 rules added

sap.m.ActionSheet visual design bug fix
sap.m.ActionSheet: ScreenReader support enhanced
sap.m.Bar: Size of the middle content is now correct
sap.m.Breadcrumbs was incorrectly handling its aggregations
sap.m.Button: press event survives re-rendering
sap.m.Carousel - Content scrolling in IE and FF is now correct
sap.m.Carousel: Control is now rendered correctly inside a dialog

sap.m.Checkbox fixed position in form on compact size
sap.m.ComboBox: exclude disable items from the auto-complete suggestion list

sap.m.DatePicker: if date is deleted open calendar on today

sap.m.Dialog: Dialog repositioning is fixed

sap.m.FeedInput: Setting focus before firing Post event to make

sap.m.FlexBox: Corrected width of VBoxes with explicit base size

sap.m.FlexBox: column flex items set to align-items:center overflow their container.

sap.m.GenericTile: Border, hover and focus changed in CSS

sap.m.GenericTile: Rendering of samples improved
sap.m.GenericTile: Sizing issue when using HCB theme fixed
sap.m.GenericTile: Tooltip behavior in IE improved
sap.m.GenericTile: Tooltip handling updated
sap.m.GenericTile: accessibility for screen reader improved
sap.m.GroupHeaderListItem: Should respect the base outline settings.
sap.m.IconTaBar: count in RTL is right aligned
sap.m.IconTaBar: scroll arrows in Text-only mode are aligned with the text now
sap.m.IconTabBar scroll arrow shows correct on phone
sap.m.IconTabBar: Displaying is now fixed when the IconTabBar is in ObjectHeader and open on phone

sap.m.IconTabBar: padding on phone fixed
sap.m.IconTabBar: setSelectedItem method is working correctly now
sap.m.Image: the load or error event should also be fired when densityAware is false
sap.m.Input - scrolling issue with suggestions
sap.m.Input suggestions: avoid unneeded list refreshes
sap.m.Input with type Number: entry is cleared unexpectedly
sap.m.Input with value help: focus handling
sap.m.Input: do not close dialog in phone mode if the input is MultiInput
sap.m.InputBase: DOM value should never be undefined but ""

sap.m.InputBase: support valuestate popup in LTR
sap.m.List/Table: No data line should be focusable.
sap.m.List: More than one list item should not be active at the same time.
sap.m.ListBase: overflow:hidden hides the scrollbars of List/Table when wrapped with ScrollContainer.
sap.m.ListItemBase: aria-setsize calculation should use children instead of find.
sap.m.ListItemBase: change flex style to support CustomListItem in IE

sap.m.MessageToast: autoClose not called on mouseLeave
sap.m.MultiComboBox: check for FocusDomRef before focus() call
sap.m.MultiInput

sap.m.MultiInput: remove old tokenizer indicator in phone mode
sap.m.NavContainer was closing the popover it's in during invalidation
sap.m.NavContainer: the data of 'to' navigation on initial page should be given back to the 'back' navigation
sap.m.NotificationListItem: If no footer buttons are shown the text occupies all the width.
sap.m.NumericContent: The icon size is corrected
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Image preserves aspect ratio

sap.m.ObjectListItem: Attribute and Statuses columns take equal space

sap.m.Panel - Fix for height property

sap.m.Panel: Unsafe toString() called on a null value

sap.m.PlanningCalendar: appointments in new line if invisible

sap.m.RadioButton: Aria attributes are not correctly rendered

sap.m.ToggleButton: incorrect visual state
